name: Tickle Twins
description:
Controls

Player  1: Arrow keys for directions and M key for Fire

Player 2: W, A, S and  D keys for  directions and F Key for Fire

On each level collect the Diamonds and take them back to your door.  Use the directions to move around, press down to pick up a diamond and fire to tickle with your feather.

Notes

Originally written in AMOS Basic, this is a conversion to libgdx.
